type.description:
## Raining

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/raining).

Checks whether it's currently raining in the world that the entity is in.

Type ID: `apugli:raining`

---

### Example
```json
"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:raining"
}
```
